import React from 'react'; import { useTranslation } from 'react-i18next'; const PainPointsSection: React.FC = () => { const { t } = useTranslation(); return (

{t('painPoints.title')}

{t('painPoints.subtitle')}

{t('painPoints.integration.title')}

{t('painPoints.integration.description')}

{t('painPoints.integration.guarantee')}

{t('painPoints.security.title')}

{t('painPoints.security.description')}

{t('painPoints.security.certification')}

{t('painPoints.pricing.title')}

{t('painPoints.pricing.description')}

{t('painPoints.pricing.transparency')}
); }; export default PainPointsSection;
